name: [XXX Trash Kittens] - My New Step Sister (NSFW)

description:
My New Step-Sister

When your dad remarried, his wife's daughter moved in with you- and she is HOT! Fresh out of college, she's developed a reputation for getting around. One day while your parents are out of town, your step-sister sneaks into your room and surprises you...

***

Hi! I'm Britt and I write Trash Kittens, a series of sexy fantasy stories featuring slutty step-sisters, trashy college chicks, and naughty schoolgirls. My text games are overflowing with hot, naughty scenes to get you in the mood. Nothing turns me on like writing kinky smut and fantasizing about hot-bodied, powerful men sweeping me off my feet and having their way with me - SO HOT! ;) 

Read more of my smut here!!

Please note these games are for Adults Only (18+)!
